question: Statement
howdrunkdoyouwanttobecome: How drunk do you want to become?
questionInfo: The minimum number of statements each player is required to write in order to enter the game
drunknessInfo: 'Tipsy' gives sips in the interval 1-3, 'Drunk' gives 1-5 sips and 'Shitfaced' gives 1-10 sips
alertdelete: Are you sure you want to delete the game?
alertroomcode: No such roomcode exists, try again!
name: Name
gameinfo: The game works like this : You will all come up with a number of statements. These statements will then be presented to you all, and each player will then vote on who in the room they think fits the statement best. The person who gets the most votes wins and gets to drink the number of sips indicated by the statement.
